inclusion.criterion: study by a research sonographer at the time of the ultrasound
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: references: Burford et al. 2011, Estey et al. 2013, Fox et al. 2008, Hulley et al. 2013, Karakas et al. 2000, Pacharn et al. 2010, Puylaert 1986
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: RLQ pain with clinical suspicion for acute appendicitis
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: imaging prior to ED ultrasound performed to evaluate the RLQ
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 17-year-old boy with severe migratory pain in right lower quadrant of abdomen, nausea and vomiting, fever, tenderness, rebound tenderness, guarding on palpation, elevated WBC, CT scan showing acute perforated appendicitis.
